{{also|kartoffel}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From older {{m|de|Tartuffel}} or {{m|de|Tartüffel}} ({{C.|18}}), from {{der|de|it|tartufolo}}, diminutive of {{m|it|tartufo||truffle}}, from {{der|de|ML.|*territūberum}} or {{der|de|la|[[terrae]] [[tūber]]||tuber of the earth}}. The use as an ethnic nickname is due to the prominence of potatoes in German cuisine, particularly vis-à-vis the cuisines of the major immigrant communities in the country. (Compare the corresponding {{m|de|Spaghetti}} used to refer to Italians.) ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kaʁˈtɔfəl/|[kaʁˈtɔfl̩]|[kaɐ̯-]|[-fəl]}} {{i|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/kɐˈtɔfəl/}} {{i|common}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Kartoffel.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Kartoffel.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Kartoffeln}} # [[potato]] #: {{syn|de|Thesaurus:Kartoffel}} # {{lb|de|derogatory}} a [[German]]; particularly an [[ethnic]] German from the perspective of [[allochthone]] populations in Germany ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|de |Bratkartoffeln |Frühkartoffel |Futterkartoffel |Pellkartoffel |Saatkartoffel |Winterkartoffel |Kartoffelacker |Kartoffelauflauf |[[Kartoffelbofist]], [[Kartoffelbovist]] |Kartoffelbranntwein |Kartoffelbrei |Kartoffelbrot |Kartoffelchip |Kartoffeldämpfer |Kartoffelernte |Kartoffelfeuer |Kartoffelflinse |Kartoffelhorde |Kartoffelhurde |Kartoffelkloß |Kartoffelknödel |Kartoffelknolle |Kartoffelkorb |Kartoffelkrankheit |Kartoffelkraut |Kartoffellegemaschine |Kartoffelmehl |Kartoffelmiete |Kartoffelmus |Kartoffelnase |Kartoffelpfannkuchen |Kartoffelkäfer |Kartoffelkuchen |Kartoffelpflanze |Kartoffelpresse |Kartoffelpuffer |Kartoffelpüree |Kartoffelsack |Kartoffelsalat |Kartoffelschale |Kartoffelschäler |Kartoffelschälmaschine |Kartoffelschälmesser |Kartoffelschnaps |Kartoffelschorf |Kartoffelsorte |Kartoffelstampfer |Kartoffelstock |Kartoffelsuppe |Kartoffelteig |Kartoffelwasser }} ====Descendants==== {{top2}} * {{desc|bor=1|bg|картоф}} * {{desctree|bor=1|da|kartoffel}} * {{desc|bor=1|et|kartul}} * {{desc|bor=1|lv|kartupelis}} * {{desc|bor=1|pl|kartofel}} * {{desc|bor=1|ro|cartof}} * {{desc|bor=1|ru|картофель}} {{see desc}} ** {{desc|der=1|ru|картошка|q=diminutive}} {{see desc}} * {{desc|bor=1|uk|картопля}} * {{desc|bor=1|yi|קאַרטאָפֿל}} {{bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * {{pedia|lang=de}} {{topics|de|Nightshades|Vegetables}} ---- ==Hunsrik== [[File:Au marché - pommes de terre.JPG|thumb|Kartoffle]] ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/kʰaˈtofl̩/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=f|plural|Kartoffle|diminutive|Kartoffelche}} # [[potato]] #: {{ux|hrx|Host-du die '''Kartoffle''' schun gekochd?|Have you already cooked the '''potatoes'''?}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|hrx|Grummbeer}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
